price: 5. Heer van de hemelen en de aarde en alles wat daar tussen is, en Heer van het oosten.
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā warabbu al-mashāriqi
